mapper.select: SELECT score.username,score.nickname,s.title,s.score,sc.code as code,submit_time as time,s.result FROM ( SELECT u.username as username,u.nickname as nickname,u.uid as uid ,MAX(s.score) as score,s.problem_id as problem_id FROM solution s,`user` u WHERE u.uid = s.uid and s.contest_id = #{contestId} and u.username = #{username} group by s.problem_id) score, source_code sc, solution s WHERE sc.solution_id = s.solution_id and s.problem_id = score.problem_id and s.score = score.score and s.uid = score.uid group by s.problem_id

SELECT u.username, u.nickname, s.problem_id, s.title, s.submit_time as time from `user` u ,solution s WHERE s.contest_id = #{contestId} and u.uid =s.uid and s.`result` = "AC" GROUP BY s.problem_id ORDER by s.submit_time
